mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ML_MATTER_CHARGE ( ID, TASK_GUID, FEE_NAME, FEE_STAND, BY_LAW, IS_DESC, DESC_EXPLAIN, REMARK, ORDER_NUM, CATALOG_CHARGE_ID, ISDEL, TENANT, TMS, VNO, TXN_ITT_CHNL_CGY_CODE, TXN_ITT_CHNL_ID, DAC_VERF ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{taskGuid} , #{feeName} , #{feeStand} , #{byLaw} , #{isDesc} , #{descExplain} , #{remark} , #{orderNum} , #{catalogChargeId} , #{isdel} , #{tenant} , #{tms} , #{vno} , #{txnIttChnlCgyCode} , #{txnIttChnlId} , #{dacVerf} )
